alert.note: Alert for East Turnagain Arm (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 4:25PM AKST until December 20 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Easterly winds gusting as high as 30 mph will reduce visibility to one half mile at times through Turnagain Arm and through Portage Valley. * WHERE...East Turnagain Arm and Portage Valley. * WHEN...Until 1 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Falling and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions will be through the evening hours. Highest snow totals near Portage Valley, with lesser totals going west along Turnagain Arm.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
